description:
The series takes place on a continent ruled by chaos. The chaos breeds disaster, but the Lords of the continent have the power of "Crest" (Holy Seal) that can calm the chaos and protect the people. However, before anyone realizes it, the rulers cast aside their creed of purifying the chaos, and instead start to fight each other for each others' Crests and to gain dominion over one another. Siluca, an isolated mage who scorns the Lords for abandoning their creed, and a wandering knight named Theo, who is on a journey to train to one day liberate his hometown, which is under tyrannical rule, make an everlasting oath to each other as master and servant and work together to reform this continent dominated by wars and chaos.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: บันทึกสงครามแกรนเครสท์

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Netorare
tags.description: Netorare is what happens when the protagonist gets their partner stolen from them by someone else. It is a sexual fetish designed to cause sexual jealousy by way of having the partner indulge in sexual activity with someone other than the protagonist.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Acting
tags.description: Centers around actors or the acting industry.

node.description:
__[Website](http://www.ayanomashiro.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ma_shi_ron) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/ayanomashiro)__

Mashiro Ayano pre-debuted in volume 17 of LisAni! (May 2014 issue) as Mashiro in "Wingless Diver," as well as volume 18 (August 2014 issue) in "Setsuna Chronicle (刹那クロニクル)." She major-debuted in singing _Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works_ (TV) OP "ideal white" in October 2014.
5th Anisong Grand Prix Finalist with Konomi Suzuki. As Asuka Ookura, she performed Sakurasou no Pet na Kanojo ED2 "Prime Number" on February 2013.

__[Website](https://www.tsubasanium.com/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tsubasacurry)__ 

__Tsubasa Itou__ is a Japanese composer, arranger and orchestrator.
Shinichi Omata is a Japanese director, storyboard artist, and former producer best known for directing Showa Genroku Rakugo Shinju (2016) and Kaguya-sama: Love is War (2019).
**Morioka Kenichi** is a Japanese art and set designer, who also does design work.
Originating from [Artland](https://anilist.co/studio/8/). Currently freelance with ties to [A-1 Pictures](https://anilist.co/studio/561/).
